supporttools.debug=Debug Information supporttools.debuginfo=This debug information can be usefull to help XWiki Support understand the problem.
supporttools.newissue.button=Create New Issue supporttools.newissue.type=Type supporttools.newissue.summary=Summary supporttools.newissue.description=Description supporttools.newissue.priority=Priority supporttools.issue.type.1=Bug supporttools.issue.type.3=Question supporttools.issue.type.6=Idea supporttools.issue.type.7=Test supporttools.issue.priority.4=Minor supporttools.issue.priority.3=Major supporttools.issue.priority.2=Critical
supporttools.newissue.title=New Issue supporttools.newissue.attachments=Attachments supporttools.newissue.addAnotherAttachment=Add another attachment supporttools.newissue.create=Create Issue supporttools.newissue.success=The issue [[{0}>>{1}]] has been created successfully. supporttools.newissue.fail=The issue could not be created. Please contact XWiki Support. supporttools.newissue.configreport=Configuration report supporttools.newissue.attachreport=Attach configuration report (only attach if not sent recently)
supporttools.issue.id=Id supporttools.issue.status=Status supporttools.issue.summary=Summary supporttools.issue.description=Description supporttools.issue.type=Type supporttools.issue.creationDate=Creation Date supporttools.issue.updateDate=Update Date supporttools.issues.list=Issues List supporttools.issues.fail=An error occured while trying to retrieve the issue list. Please check [[your configuration settings>>url:{0}]] or contact XWiki Support. supporttools.issues.noissues=No issues
supporttools.sendreport.button=Send Configuration Report supporttools.sendreport.title=Send Configuration Report supporttools.sendreport.confirm=Confirm sending configuration report supporttools.sendreport.info=This tools allows to send a report about your installation to XWiki SAS' support team. All information will be kept strictly confidential. supporttools.sendreport.success=The report has been sent to XWiki SAS successfully. supporttools.sendreport.fail=The report could not be sent to XWiki SAS. You can download the report below and send it by email to "support@xwiki.com". supporttools.sendreport.download=Download report
supporttools.sendheapdump.button=Send a memory heap dump supporttools.sendheapdump.title=Send the memory heap dump supporttools.sendheapdump.confirm=Confirm sending the memory heap dump (this can slow down your server) supporttools.sendheapdump.info={{warning}}Warning ! This tool can slow down your server. It should only be used off-hours. It is also possible that the file generated is too big to be sent using the Internet. In this case it should be transfered using other means{{/warning}}\n\nThis tool allows to send a complete "memory heap dump" of your XWiki instance to XWiki SAS. supporttools.sendheapdump.success=The memory heap dump has been sent to XWiki SAS. supporttools.sendheapdump.fail=The memory heap dump could not be sent to XWiki SAS. It is possible that the file is too big. You can download it below.". supporttools.sendheapdump.download=Download the memory heap dump
supporttools.downloadreport.nojob=No report Id has been indicated. Here are the following reports available: supporttools.downloadreport.downloading=Downloading report supporttools.downloadreport.reportfrom=Report from date {0} supporttools.downloadreport.title=Download Reports
supporttools.downloadheapdump.nojob=No heap dump has been indicated. Here are the following heap dump available: supporttools.downloadheapdump.downloading=Downloading heap dump supporttools.downloadheapdump.reportfrom=Heapdump from date {0} supporttools.downloadheapdump.title=Download Heap Dumps
